text.text_translated: Springsteen is a famous American singer‑songwriter. He is still releasing new music even though he is in his late 60s. He is still at the top of his game. This does not surprise me. He tells us our most basic stories about ourselves. When you listen to Born in the USA, his 1984 album that describes American life, you hear those stories. Those stories are as relevant today as they ever were.
